actions.committee: House Committee on Merchant Marine and Fisheries
actions.text: Referred to House Committee on Merchant Marine and Fisheries.

official_title: A resolution to bar the Secretary of Commerce from issuing permits under the Fisheries Conservation and Management Act of 1976 to foreign processing vessels for the purpose of receiving and processing fish harvested by vessels of the United States during 1978.

summary.text: Prohibits the Secretary of Commerce from issuing permits pursuant to the Fisheries Conservation and Management Act of 1976 which authorize foreign vessels to receive or process fish harvested by vessels of the United States within the fisheries conservation zone during 1978.

titles.title: A resolution to bar the Secretary of Commerce from issuing permits under the Fisheries Conservation and Management Act of 1976 to foreign processing vessels for the purpose of receiving and processing fish harvested by vessels of the United States during 1978.
